text: Sumo...why I dont believe in love Can you believe this guy.. omg.. where to start.. I was going to text you, but figured this might be better.. it may be long.. kinda.. even you are blasting me on .. I am going to be a nice guy, cant help it. maybe you will even stop blasting me... first off I never meant to imply or make you feel, or think you will always be alone. for that I am sorry. what I was trying to say, from personal experience, that i could not possibly be happy with anyone, until i was happy with myself. and i wouldn't wish anyone to be alone forever.. that would be absolutely awful.. and make me a very bad person to wish that on anyone.. i never ed or implied you were a bitch, just as i never said a woman was cheating on me. we would have to be in a relationship for her to on me. which we are not..we have shared time together, but i have made it very clear to her i am not looking for a relationship. twice before she has told me she wants to take things toward a relationship. i know shes not the right one, if you will, so i wont take advantage of her and settle for making her the one for right now. i think deep down she knows im not the one either.. but women love nice guys.. i have no desire to wake up next to someone in the morning and look for reasons to run out because i regret choices i made the night before. im not 18 anymore.. you know? how do i know im not the one miserable?.. lets see... first off im single.. just kidding.. kinda.. last night i had drinks and dinner with a very beautiful woman.. did not have to worry about anyone getting mad.. tonight i will probably go dancing for a little bit.. tomorrow night a friend asked me to take her to some beerfest thing. sunday a different friend wants to go ghost hunting.. and the thing is.. to be honest? im really not good looking.. and i know it.. yet women like to hang out.. and nobody i know wants to be around someone who is unhappy, a downer...u know? the only reason i believe some of the women i am friends with even want a relationship with me is because i treat them with respect and i really am a nice guy believe it or not.. if youll re-read my very first few i think you will see i was nothing but nice.. no anger.. even wished you a good day at work... i dunno if this helps you or not.. i hope in some way it does.. and i truly do hope whatever it is in life that makes you happy finds you.. the friend i had dinner with last night just lost her 38 yr old sister and life truly is to short to go thru angry, upset, unhappy.. or whatever else negative.
title: Free Sex personals Women want real sex Poole
